style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Managed Memory = 40% of 10 GB = 4 GB</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="270" x="164" y="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-4" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Per-slot budget = 4 GB / 2 slots = 2 GB</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="290" x="164" y="279" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-5" edge="1" parent="1" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="153" y="330" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="600" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-7" text-align: left; text-wrap-mode: wrap;">&nbsp;Slot[1</font><font face="monospace" style="font-size: 12px; text-align: left; text-wrap-mode: wrap;">]&nbsp;</font></span>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" x="-0.7536" y="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-11" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-8" edge="1" parent="1" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;" value="<span><font face="monospace" style="font-size: 12px; text-align: left; text-wrap-mode: wrap;">&nbsp;Slot[2</font><font face="monospace" style="font-size: 12px; text-align: left; text-wrap-mode: wrap;">]&nbsp;</font></span>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" x="-0.7536" y="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-11" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-11" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">MemoryManager budget: 2 GB</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="270" x="205" y="340" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-12" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Active consumers in this slot: STATE_BACKEND only<br>(no batch operators, no Python..)</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="365" x="205" y="370" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-13" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">STATE_BACKEND gets 100% = 2 GB</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="270" x="205" y="394" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-16" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">SourceMap[1]</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="270" x="205" y="440" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-17" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Operator state only. <br>No managed memory reserved.</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="350" x="230" y="464" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-18" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Window[1] (keyed state → RocksDB)</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="270" x="205" y="510" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-19" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Reserves 2 GB from MemoryManager <br>(budget reservation, not segments)</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="360" x="230" y="534" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-24" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">The 2 GB budget absorbs WBM 1.5× overshoot:</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="440" x="250" y="580" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-25" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">Write Buffer Manager<br>Capacity: 2 × total × ratio / 3</font><div><font face="monospace">Peak: 1.5 × capacity<br>Active memtables across column families</font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="57" width="332" x="278" y="653" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-27" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="330" x="270" y="718" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> Pool: high-prio-pool-ratio × cache<br>Index/filter blocks pinned in cache</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="352" x="278" y="717" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-29" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="23" width="330" x="270" y="758" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell split as Slot 0.</span>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="290" x="209.5" y="925" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-39" parent="1" id="rfQvPQPZCkkkCRQ-fxPF-41" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<font face="monospace">LRU cache&nbsp; &nbsp;= (3 - ratio) × total / 3<br>wbm_cap&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;= 2 × total × ratio / 3</font>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="300" x="270" y="606" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.font:
LRU cache = (3 - ratio) × total / 3
wbm_cap = 2 × total × ratio / 3
